question: In which year did India won its first WORLD CUP?

WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY 'DIAMOND DUCK' in cricket?
options: when a batter gets out 2 times continuouslly by same bowler
when the batter gets out on the first legal ball faced by him
when the batter gets out after 3 minutes he enters the ground
when the batter gets out without facing any legal delivery
answer: when the batter gets out without facing any legal delivery
